Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var trigger2 = TriggerBuilder.Create()                  .WithIdentity("myTrigger2")                  .StartNow()                  .WithSimpleSchedule(x => x.WithIntervalInMinutes(3))                  .Build();

The following statement contains a magic number: var trigger3 = TriggerBuilder.Create()                  .WithIdentity("myTrigger3")                  .ForJob(jobDetail2)                  .StartNow()                  .WithSimpleSchedule(x => x.WithIntervalInSeconds(2).RepeatForever())                  //.WithSimpleSchedule(x => x.WithIntervalInMinutes(5).RepeatForever())                  .Build();
